info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:29PM PDT by NWS Medford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jackson and east central Josephine Counties through 600 PM PDT... At 528 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Applegate, or 15 miles southeast of Grants Pass, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cantrall Buckley County Park, Applegate, Ruch and Provolt. This includes Highway 238 in Oregon between mile markers 12 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
